items.name: Gombe Star Explorers Dome
items.short_description: An immersive digital planetarium offering educational shows about stars, planets, and galaxies, tailored for young astronomers. Kids can lie back and watch the cosmos unfold.
items.address: Federal Low-Cost Housing Estate, Along Dukku Road, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Cosmos Kids Planetarium
items.short_description: Engage in interactive exhibits and virtual tours of the solar system. This planetarium focuses on making complex astronomical concepts accessible and fun for children through engaging visuals.
items.address: Near Gombe State University, Tudun Wada, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Galaxy Gombe Junior
items.short_description: A state-of-the-art dome theatre where kids can embark on guided space missions. Special programs include meteor showers simulations and alien encounter stories designed for young imaginations.
items.address: Opposite Federal Teaching Hospital Gombe, New GRA, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Astro-Adventures Hub
items.short_description: Combines a small planetarium with hands-on science exhibits. Children can build mini-rockets, explore moon rocks, and discover the wonders of the universe in a playful environment.
items.address: Behind Gombe International Hotel, Investment Layout, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Gombe Treasure Trail
items.short_description: An outdoor scavenger hunt across a themed park, challenging kids to solve riddles and follow clues to find hidden treasures. Perfect for groups and birthday parties.
items.address: Along Bauchi Road, Near Gombe Emirates Palace, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Safari Quest Challenge
items.short_description: Navigate through a jungle-themed obstacle course with puzzles and challenges, pretending to be a wildlife explorer. Kids can earn badges for completing various tasks.
items.address: Behind Gombe International Market, Pantami, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Lost Temple of Kaltungo
items.short_description: An indoor adventure game where children solve ancient mysteries and decipher hieroglyphs to escape a 'lost temple.' Features light and sound effects for an immersive experience.
items.address: Gombe-Yola Road, Near Kaltungo Junction, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Secret Garden Escape
items.short_description: A whimsical outdoor escape room experience set in a beautiful garden. Kids work together to find clues and unlock the secrets of the magical garden before time runs out.
items.address: Gombe-Biu Road, Opposite Gombe State University, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Gombe Mini Zoo & Farm
items.short_description: A charming local attraction featuring a variety of domestic animals and some exotic birds. Kids can enjoy feeding sessions and learn about animal care.
items.address: Near Tunfure Village, Gombe-Bauchi Road, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Savannah Petting Friends
items.short_description: A unique petting zoo experience with animals native to the savanna, like miniature goats, rabbits, and friendly tortoises. Supervised interactions and photo opportunities are available.
items.address: Gombe-Dukku Road, Opposite Gombe State Ministry of Education, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Wildlife Wonders Haven
items.short_description: Dedicated to small wildlife conservation and education, this center allows children to observe various small mammals, reptiles, and birds in naturalistic habitats.
items.address: Along Kashere Road, Near Gombe Federal University Kashere, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Animal Kingdom Gombe Kids
items.short_description: A family-friendly animal park focusing on native Nigerian fauna. It offers guided tours, animal shows, and a designated petting area for supervised interaction with gentle creatures.
items.address: Gombe-Biu Road, Before Ashaka Cement Company, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Gombe Magical Circus
items.short_description: A thrilling family circus featuring acrobats, clowns, magicians, and animal acts (ethical ones). Prepare for gasps and laughter with every spectacular performance under the big top.
items.address: Event Grounds, Along NTA Road, Off Bauchi Road, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Kaltungo Puppet Palace
items.short_description: An enchanting puppet theater showcasing traditional Nigerian folk tales and modern children's stories. Engaging live performances with beautifully crafted marionettes and hand puppets.
items.address: Cultural Center, Near Government House, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Gombe Funfair & Acrobatics
items.short_description: A vibrant funfair with small rides, games, and regular street acrobatics and juggling performances. Enjoy a festive atmosphere with delicious snacks and thrilling acts.
items.address: Public Square, Opposite Gombe Main Market, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Storyland Marionette Show
items.short_description: Delightful performances featuring intricate marionettes bringing classic and original stories to life. A charming and intimate theater experience perfect for younger children.
items.address: Children's Library Complex, Tunfure GRA, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Gombe Green Farm Adventures
items.short_description: Experience life on a working farm! Kids can participate in planting, harvesting, and feeding farm animals. Educational and hands-on activities make agriculture fun.
items.address: Along Gombe-Potiskum Road, Kwami LGA, Gombe State.

items.name: Harvest Hues Ranch
items.short_description: A picturesque ranch offering pony rides, hayrides, and opportunities to pick seasonal fruits and vegetables. Enjoy the fresh air and rural charm of Gombe.
items.address: Dukku Road Extension, Near Gombe Airstrip, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Little Farmers Eco Park
items.short_description: An eco-friendly farm park focused on sustainable farming practices. Kids learn about composting, organic gardening, and the importance of biodiversity through interactive displays.
items.address: Along NAFRC Road, Opp. Gombe State Polytechnic, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Animal Barn & Tractor Rides
items.short_description: A lively barnyard where children can meet and feed various farm animals. The highlight is a fun tractor ride around the fields, offering scenic views and a taste of rural life.
items.address: Gombe-Yola Road, Dadin Kowa, Gombe State.

items.name: Gombe Enchanted Forest
items.short_description: Wander through a magical forest filled with characters from classic fairy tales. Discover hidden paths, magical fountains, and storytelling sessions under ancient trees.
items.address: Adjacent to Gombe City Gate, Along Biu Road, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Princess Palace Gardens
items.short_description: A beautiful park designed for aspiring princesses and knights, featuring elegant gardens, a small castle for dress-up, and meet-and-greet opportunities with beloved fairy tale royalty.
items.address: Tunfure GRA Extension, Near Gombe Specialist Hospital, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Dragon's Lair Adventure Park
items.short_description: An exciting fairy tale park for the more adventurous, featuring mild roller coasters, a dragon-themed maze, and interactive challenges to 'defeat' mythical creatures.
items.address: Along Gombe-Yola Bypass, Adjacent to Gombe Airport, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Whispering Woods Storyland
items.short_description: A serene and interactive park where classic children's stories come to life through animated displays, gentle rides, and character performances. Ideal for younger children.
items.address: Near Gombe State Specialist Hospital, Tumfure, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Gombe Splash Zone
items.short_description: A fantastic water park featuring multiple slides, splash pads, and a lazy river designed for all ages, with dedicated areas for toddlers and older children.
items.address: Along Bauchi Road, Opposite Gombe International Hotel, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Tropical Aqua Kids Park
items.short_description: Immerse yourselves in a tropical-themed water playground with small slides, tipping buckets, and interactive water jets. Lifeguards ensure a safe and fun experience.
items.address: Near Federal College of Education (Technical), Gombe-Biu Road, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Oasis Lagoon Fun
items.short_description: A serene water park with a large shallow lagoon for swimming, small gentle slides, and shaded relaxation areas. Ideal for families with very young children.
items.address: Opposite Gombe State University, Bojude Road, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Desert Rivers Water Play
items.short_description: Experience unique water features mimicking desert rivers and oases. This park offers interactive splash zones, water cannons, and a themed splash pad for cooling off.
items.address: Gombe-Jos Road, Near Gombe City Centre, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Gombe Kiddie Wonderland
items.short_description: A classic theme park filled with gentle rides, carousels, and fun houses suitable for young children. Enjoy a day of simple joys and colorful attractions.
items.address: Along Gombe-Bauchi Expressway, Near Gombe Airport, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Gombe Grand Adventures
items.short_description: An exciting theme park featuring medium-thrill rides, interactive zones, and live entertainment. Designed for slightly older children and adventurous families.
items.address: Gombe Industrial Layout, Along Gombe-Biu Road, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Future City Funzone
items.short_description: A futuristic theme park with virtual reality attractions, robotic displays, and science-themed rides. Kids can explore innovation and technology in a playful setting.
items.address: Opposite Federal Secretariat Complex, GRA, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Fantasy Island Gombe
items.short_description: A diverse theme park featuring distinct themed zones like a pirate island, a dinosaur land, and a magical forest. Each zone offers unique rides and attractions.
items.address: Gombe-Yola Road, Dadin Kowa Dam Area, Gombe State.

items.name: Gombe Character Central
items.short_description: A dedicated venue where children can meet, hug, and take photos with popular cartoon characters. Features rotating appearances and scheduled interaction times.
items.address: City Mall Gombe, Opposite Bauchi Park, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Toon Town Meet & Greet
items.short_description: Step into a colorful Toon Town where beloved cartoon mascots roam freely, ready to greet and entertain children. Expect impromptu dances and playful interactions.
items.address: Children's Amusement Park, Along Kashere Road, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Superhero Hangout Gombe
items.short_description: Meet your favorite superheroes! Kids can interact with costumed heroes, learn some 'super moves,' and even participate in a mini superhero training session.
items.address: Gombe Sports Complex, Pantami Stadium Road, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Animania Mascot Meetup
items.short_description: A lively spot where children can high-five and dance with a variety of animal mascots from popular animated shows. Great for energetic kids who love to move.
items.address: Gombe Youth Center, Adjacent to Unity Bank, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Gombe Funland Playground
items.short_description: A large public playground with swings, slides, climbing structures, and sandpits. Suitable for various age groups, offering ample space for free play and imagination.
items.address: Gombe Main Park, Off Palace Road, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Jubilee Park Adventure Zone
items.short_description: An expansive adventure park with challenging rope courses, zip lines, and multi-level climbing frames. Encourages physical activity and problem-solving in a natural setting.
items.address: Along Gombe-Yola Road, Dadin Kowa, Gombe State.

items.name: Urban Jungle Gym
items.short_description: An indoor adventure playground designed like a jungle, with soft play areas, slides, ball pits, and tunnels. Perfect for active play during hot or rainy weather.
items.address: City Centre Mall, Gombe Central, Gombe, Gombe State.

items.name: Gombe Climb & Play Arena
items.short_description: A modern facility offering rock climbing walls (with auto-belay for kids), bouldering sections, and a creative play zone. Promotes physical development and confidence.
items.address: Behind Gombe State Secretariat, New GRA, Gombe, Gombe State.
